InfoContainer.title: Description
InfoContainer.description: I am open to taking on interesting design challenges. My goal is to create intuitive and aesthetically pleasing user experiences in the virtual space.
InfoContainer.educationText:
Social Informatics (in progress) 
 - AGH University of Krakow

Services.service1_desc: I build fast, responsive, and optimized websites tailored to client needs.
Services.service2_desc: I create digital solutions with a focus on usability and user experience.
Services.service3_desc: I design a wide range of graphic materials, from banners to visual identity.

Footer.description: Are you interested in collaboration or have questions? Contact me, and I will be happy to discuss how I can help you achieve your projects and goals.
